title: 2 Acres paddy field views - LIP 137
details: LIP-137 The property is located approximately 3 km inland from Ahangama in a very quiet location with wonderful views over the paddy fields. The complete property has been planted with cinnamon which produces a very good income from the land. Ahangama beach which is perfect for swimming and surfing is only 2.5 km away, Welhengoda surfing beach is 4 km away, Unawatuna beach is 15 km away. The property is ideal for a commercial purposes or a villas project with plantations and gardens.
